thread.section_title: The Queen's Gate Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Short stay in London
thread.title_full: Short stay in London - Review of The Queen's Gate Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: David G
title: Short stay in London
text:
Family room booked, loads of space and very comfortable, clean and tidy, bathroom a bit small for the larger built person. Breakfast good, first morning a bit chaotic, buffet running out of food and toast machine taking ages.
The hotel next morning had made changes at breakfast and the experience was much better.
Staff friendly and helpful, reception area is small and can be very busy at peak times with only two staff on duty.
Will be back next time visiting London, great location, reasonably priced and would recommend the hotel.
